title: wheres my skin rito?
body: i was told that i would recieve a dank birthday poro icon but i dont have that.  nor do i have my kayle skin.  can i get my stuff please? it is far past the weekend.

replies.body:
We're still getting these gifts sent out. We've had to send them out in batches to ensure they went out properly.

Please let me know if you don't see anything by the 23rd, which is tomorrow.
hey i still havent recieved the kayle skin or poro icon :( a champ riven skin would be fine tho just sayin :)
and i expect free championship riven for my inconvenience
They are still being distributed. The final day is the 23rd, so if you haven't received them by then, you can submit a support ticket.
